name: Buy 3 products with Efecty and register a new account
scenarioId: KoajCompraRegistrado:Buy 3 products with Efecty and register a new account
methodName: Buy 3 products with Efecty and register a new account

testSteps.description: Given The user <name> is in the Web page "https://www.koaj.co/"

When Registers and start session with the user information <name> <apellido> <email> <password> <id> <phoneNumber> <address>
| name | apellido | email | password | id | phoneNumber | address |
| "jorge" | "deneiva" | "prueba@example.com" | "jorge1234" | "1234123412" | "312323114" | "av 7 #11-76" |

And select the products and add them to the Car
| name |
| Buzo unicolor con acabados en rib, bolsillo y capota |
| Pantalón unicolor jogger con elástico en botas y bolsillos |
| Tenis planos unicolores con texturas perforadas y plataforma |
Then it should go to the order confirmation
And be able to download the payment code

userStory.narrative:
I as the user of the web page Koaj
  want to be able to Register and Buy products
  For having access to the services and deliveries of the webpage

title: Buy 3 products with Efecty and register a new account
